templates.title: Maybe Finance
templates.name: maybe-finance
templates.description: Maybe is a fully* open-source OS for your personal finances built by a small team alongside an incredible community Discord

env.name: SELF_HOSTED
env.label: SELF_HOSTED
env.description: Indicates whether the application is self-hosted (true/false).

env.name: RAILS_FORCE_SSL
env.label: RAILS_FORCE_SSL
env.description: Determines if SSL should be forced (true/false).

env.name: GOOD_JOB_EXECUTION_MODE
env.label: GOOD_JOB_EXECUTION_MODE
env.description: Sets the execution mode for GoodJob (e.g., async).

env.name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
env.label: SECRET_KEY_BASE
env.description: Secret key used for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

env.name: DB_HOST
env.label: DB_HOST
env.description: Hostname for the PostgreSQL database service.

env.name: POSTGRES_DB
env.label: POSTGRES_DB
env.description: PostgreSQL database to be created and used by the application.

env.name: POSTGRES_USER
env.label: POSTGRES_USER
env.description: Username for connecting to the PostgreSQL database.
